mapper.select:
select notice_no as noticeNO, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_write_date as noticeWriteDate, notice_view_count as noticeViewCount
from notice

select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_write_date as noticeWriteDate, notice_contents as noticeContents, notice_view_count as noticeViewCount from notice where notice_no = 1
